attributes.action: set up an independent Press Complaints Authority.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Press Complaints Commission has failed, as a self-regulatory body, e.g., by the continual and scientifically unjustified stigmatisation of schizophrenics in tabloids of different political hues. Self-regulation was deemed inadequate for the police - it is also inadequate for the press.
